name: Diatom Enterprises
tagline: Custom software development and IT Consulting
description:
Diatom Enterprises is a Canada founded and Latvia based software development company  producing custom software solutions for a wide variety of industries all around the Globe. 
Owing to 15+ years of practical experience and constantly tracking trends in leading software technologies we are providing highly efficient services of outstanding quality at an affordable price for our clients, who have become our friends over the years of work. 
We are proficient in Javascript, React, Angular, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, .NET and other technologies. We offer Web, Mobile, and Desktop development.
